short_summary: Provide shredder system for CFB Kingston\u2019s Logistic Support Squadron (LSS) clothing stores
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to supply, deliver, off-load and complete the installation, anchoring, and testing of one shredder system for CFB Kingston\u2019s Logistic Support Squadron (LSS) clothing stores. The contractor must provide all hardware, tools and personnel to complete delivery and installation of the shredder to the customer location.
duration_in_months: There is insufficient information regarding the contract duration.
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
# W0114-220011 - Industrial Shredder [English] | Déchiqueteuse industrielle [Français]
=============================================

## Contract Information
---------------

* **Reference Number:** WS3695752186-Doc3723019117
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3695752186
* **Publication Date:** October 26, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 12, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 19, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None

## Procurement Information
----------------------

* **Request for Proposal:** [English] | [Français]
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal | Demande de Proposition
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements:** The contract is open to contractors from signatory countries to the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).

## Deliverables
------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supplier to deliver, install, and test one shredder system for the Logistics Support Squadron (LSS) clothing stores at the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Kingston.

## Location
---------

* **Installation Location:** CFB Kingston
* **Contracting Entity Address:**
	+ English: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5 Canada
	+ Français: 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0S5 Canada

## Contact Information
------------------

* **Name:** Ocheoha, Yvonne (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** yvonne.ocheoha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Additional Information
------------------------

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **UNSPSC Category:** 23152100 - Separation Machinery and Equipment
